Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model_view

Class MatchView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.model_view.MatchView
  • public class MatchView
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Match on client

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<PlayerView> allPlayers
      Contains all players of the match
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> connections
      Players' connection state during the match: true if online, false if offline

      Current player of the match

      DecksView of the match

      Representation of this client, during the match
      private int skulls
      Current skulls of the match
      private java.util.List<java.util.Map<PlayerView,​java.lang.Integer>> track
      Map a PlayerView with her number of kills on killshotTrack

      • MatchView

        public MatchView​(java.lang.String myName,
                 int layoutConfig,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> players,
                 java.util.List<PlayerColor> colors,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> connections)
        Creates a MatchView, initializing all attributes with given values
        Parameters:
        myName - Player's name associated to this client
        layoutConfig - Layout configuration of the match
        players - All players of the match
        colors - Colors of the player of the match
        connections - Players' connection state of the match
